name: Kill The McKnights
description:
University Project 1st semester of the Digital Games course at Universidade Feevale
  • Adobe Animate CC 2017
  • Action Script 3.0
  • English
  • Single Player
  • WEB (Flash) / PC
Credits
  • Abimael William Heldt Biberg - Environment / Level Design
  • Kevin da Silva - Interface / Audio
  • Lennon Wagner Garcia - Characters / Animations
  • Lucas Schneider Postai - Programming / Management
  • Guilherme Theisen Schneider - Project Guidance
Story

After a failed bank robbery, the McKnight gang leader, Maggie, is arrested in the town of Angerville. The members of the gang, children of Margareth, seek revenge and attack the city. Their attack is successful and they take control of Angerville.

What they were not expecting was that Alex Graves, the Fastest Trigger in The West, would come to town to drink his favorite whiskey. When he realizes that the city is overrun by the McKnights and knows that each member is worth a pretty penny, he goes after his reward...

Controls
  • Move Alex - WASD or ↑ ↓← → 
  • Shoot - Space
  • Pistol - 1
  • Shotgun - 2
